name: Phishing Trip
description:
This game is made for the Cybersecurity Game Jam

You are a newly hired employee at the cybersecurity company Ocisis. Block or forward the wide variety of emails received by your company to your manager with minimal errors to prevent being fired from your job for 7 days, each day with more criteria than the last. Ineptitude in performing your duties will result in immediate termination of your position.

The controls are simple:

- Click on an email to read

- Forward the emails that are legitimate

- Block the emails that are suspicious

You will learn more methods of determining suspicious emails throughout your days at Ocisis, but hey this job can't be that hard right?

An infraction will be logged on your profile each time you forward an email that should have been blocked or vice versa. Too many infractions will result in immediate termination of your position.

Good luck. Do not disappoint your employer.
